issue.title: [Python][Java] Ensure jvm module doesn't leak java buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9468](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9468). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7753 we should ensure we aren't leaking JVM direct memory when Python objects are collected
